name: Task Force (itch)
description:
This is a First Person Shooter game.

Objective - Kill all enemies, tanks to complete the game.

It was a project about implementing some of the common first person shooter elements which can be found in any AAA game like Call of Duty, Modern Warfare, Tomb Raider etc.

This project was made in a week and it requires a lot of improvements but still it's in prototyping stage.

Controls:-

W/A/S/D - Movement

E - Drive

G - Throw Grenade

C / Left Control - Crouch

R - Reload Gun

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

1 - Select Pistol

2 - Select Assault Rifle
